Posts.Content: Jun 9, 2013 09:23PM Donna7 wrote: I was diagnosed from colonoscopy and endoscopy. I don't have a primary tumor that they can find but my pathology is er/pr positive and her2 neg. I have not had surgery or chemo and am wondering if anyone else has been treated with femora only ?
Posts.Title: Anyone out there with stage four treatment with femora only Donna7 curveball

Posts.Content: Donna7 wrote: I have been diagnosed with stage 4 breast cancer mets to stomach and colon and so far the only recommended treatment has been femora. They say inoperable and I am wondering if anybody else is being treated with hormone therapy only ???? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Anyone out there with stage four treatment with femora only Donna7 curveball

Posts.Content: Jun 10, 2013 03:27PM Donna7 wrote: Thank you to everyone that has responded !! I have completely changed my diet and exercise everyday now. I am praying for a miracle and you ladies have given me hope !! I wish all continued improvement !!!! Had my blood taken today and follow up with oncologist. On Thursday. Than-you, Donna
